name: Flock Block
description:
Winter is coming and there is an over population of ducks in the south. It's your job to shoot them down before they get there! Be careful, allow 10 ducks to pass and it's game over.

Arrows to move, z to shoot, x to reload.

This is a game for TIC-80, a fantasy console, check it out!

v1.1:

  • GUI Changes
  • Snow
  • Easy/Normal/Hard modes
  • New duck color
